TopicTitle: How to get thrusters to work?

Articles.Content: I\'m pressing the buttons required to activate the thrusters near my command pod (I,H,J,K,L or something like that) but they don\'t do anything at all. Is there some kind of requirement I need to use these? I have them attached to my S.A.S. module.
Did you remember to include an RCS fuel tank? The thrusters by themselves don\'t work unless they are provided with fuel.
You should also be sure to press \'r\' to enable them.

Rofl, I probably forgot the fuel tank.

Thanks.

I\'ve forgotten tanks tons of times.

I\'ve also forgotten thrusters.

And parachutes.
